subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Kentucky will carry an undefeated record into the Final Four in Indianapolis this weekend. But last Aug. 17, this same team lost, 63-62, to the Dominican Republic national team.
snippet: Kentucky will carry an undefeated record into the Final Four in Indianapolis this weekend. But last Aug. 17, this same team lost, 63-62, to the Dominican Republic national team.
